## Description
 Rinse rice, dry, and finely grind.

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Skill Level:|2|
|Tech Level:|1|
|Process Time:|300.0 millisols|
|Work Level:|25.0 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.25 kW/hr|

| Produce      | Amount |
|--------:|:------|
